resources.string: "Choose the default keyboard that you'll use for writing messages, notes, and just about everything else. Note that you can install other third-party keyboards later."
" View the selected keyboard's Privacy Policy."
To insert your SIM card, read the instructions that came with your device.
"Couldn't find SIM card. Make sure SIM card is properly installed and you have sufficient funds on your balance."
Allow apps to access your location.
Help improve our products and services by sending anonymous usage data.
The information we collect will be used to locate and analyze the problems in the system and may contain personal information. No data will be used to identify you personally.
MIUI will select the best moment to install updates.
No network connection. View the Privacy Policy for this keyboard at %s.

"Your privacy is very important to us. Read our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy to understand what information we collect, how we use it, and what choices are available to you.
You must agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy before you can use MIUI. Mi services, Mi SIM activation services, Mi Cloud, Find device, Home screen, Game center, MAB ,MiuiDaemon and MSA system components, web apps, quick cards, statistics, smart cards, Mi Link, and Mi Account components will connect to the internet and acquire your location."

"Your privacy is very important to us. Read our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy to understand what information we collect, how we use it, and what choices are available to you.
You must agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy before you can use MIUI. Mi services, Mi SIM activation services, Mi Cloud, Find device, Home screen, Game center, MAB ,MiuiDaemon and MSA system components, web apps, quick cards, statistics, smart cards, Mi Link, Mi Account, and Google Play services components will connect to the internet and acquire your location."
"I've read and agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy."
"You don't have an internet connection. View the Terms of Service at %s."
"You don't have an internet connection. View the Privacy Policy at %s."
Use your fingerprint to unlock your device, verify Mi Pay transactions, or to sign in to apps and services.
Use your fingerprint to unlock your device, or to sign in to apps and services.
Swipe up to enter the system

You turned on TalkBack by pressing the screen with 2 fingers for more than 10 seconds. TalkBack provides voice feedback for people with visual impairments. If you turned it on by accident, tap the Cancel button, and then double tap the screen.

"In order to improve the services provided to you, the mobile network operator of your choice may upload your personal data and the info about this device to its servers using Wi-Fi networks or mobile data connection. This information will only be used for statistical purposes in order to improve the quality of the services and provide more personalized content. This information won't be used to identify you personally and won't be disclosed to third parties."
Keep holding down two fingers to enable accessibility.
Say \"Mi AI\" into your phone. Mi AI will recognize your voice and will be able to control your device.
